Posts.Content: May 13, 2011 08:50PM PSU222 wrote: Hello Sue My second day after chemo was the worst.  I had my first treatment on 04/25 (T/C) and felt as though I had a bad flu.   My 2nd treatment will be on Monday.  I work full time and missed work on the day of treatment and then 1 additional day.  The side effects will pass and you will have better days.   The ladies on these threads have been so helpful to me as they will be for you.   It's OK to lay down when you don't feel well.  Your body is telling you to take it easy.
